==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|lit=three, down five, take away two}}

===Etymology===
A [[mnemonic]] device to aid with adding 3 to 2, 3 and 4 in base 10 (also 7, 8 and 9 in base 16).

* Ex. <math>3+3=6</math>
*# Start with three beads on the bottom (each lower bead is equal to 1).
*# Move one of the top beads down (each top bead is equal to 5).
*# Take away two of the beads from the bottom.
*# This leaves you with one top bead (5) and one bottom bead (1), for a total of 6.
